cons: to mucho time at work
pros: excellent career opportunity and payment

cons: Intel is only an ingredient of the solutions so you are not really part of the implementations and deploymentsSome decisions are taken not considering the local business or local markets
pros: Always at the edge of innovationGreat Place To WorkDevelopment measured on objectives achievementHome Based Office WorkersWonderful job
summary: Wonderful company to be part of

cons: Needs a more formal development plan
pros: Great friendly team and excellent bonus

cons: Cant think of anything in particular that could be considered as a con.
advice: Cant think of anything in particular that could be an advice to management.
pros: Great Place to work. Respectful colleagues and managers. Employees are valued well. Chance to work on the cutting edge CPU architectures.

cons: Bureaucratic structure and in this moment is changing the organization, so can be very stressfull in some areas
pros: Good life balance, focus on the employee and their wellness

cons: You need approval for Getting any information
advice: fix the cons
pros: Corporate great to work atmosphere

cons: Open space in most of buildings in campus.Performance management - it really can be done better. Other big IT companies changed it already.
advice: In R&D site your engineers are your biggest treasure."... go off and do something wonderful".
pros: Very high salary and bonuses.I work with great SW/FW/HW engineers. It's a big pleasure and privilege.During the last few years there was a significant investiment in our Gdansk campus. All major engineering groups have presence here: Data Center Group (servers/cloud/telco/networking), VPG (graphics), PEG (client, chipsets), IOT group. This gives many options for technical and career growth. There is a good ch… ance you will work on a "bleeding edge" product.Much was done to attract women to R&D organization. They are recognized here (it's a 'pros' for them).Very good location, many commute options.

cons: Downgrading PC and mobile MArket segment
pros: Amazing company to work an colaborate with ecosystem

cons: Salaries are not so high for RCG!
pros: Work life balanceDiversityCareer OpportunitiesManager supportInnovation

cons: there are not so many activities, not easy to get the return offer, the tax is high, and do not have living bonus and other bonus.
advice: work hard ,work hard get the work hard get the work hard get the work hard get the work hard get the work hard get the work hard get the work hard get the
pros: 9:00 to 5:00 , no work at weekend, good facility, people are very nice, free fruit, nice dinning hall an d bus.

cons: none, cafeteria needs to improve a bit.
advice: keep taking care of employees, they are the real assets of the company
pros: work life balance is great in intel

cons: excessive "do it yourself"culture without much help from "support"areas
pros: great culture, excellent benefits, huge investments in innovation and R&D

cons: the projects got changed too much recently!
pros: Good regular training. good opportunities to grow professional skill

cons: In SMG difficult to get hired immediately, sometimes getting an offer job is nearly impossible
advice: follow up interns, since it is a great sales and marketing school, interns later arrive to other places where strategic marketing and sales is as exciting as when you were at Intel, the learning curve and the know how is probably lost for Intel
pros: When you get hired for SMG you'll have a great place to learn, you get total exposure to all business lines, you get involved in high level projects

cons: High pressure job. Always rushing for deadlines
advice: Stop having dungeons !!!
pros: TComp, Work Life Effectiveness, Flexi Hours, Business Trip travels

cons: Not that I could think of at the moment
advice: Keep up the good work in keeping Intel the best company, and workforce driven for better future.
pros: Working environment and also practice a good work life balance.

cons: Work life balance can be difficult.
advice: Keep working on the work life balance programs
pros: Salaries and comp and benefits.

cons: Heavy, too formal processes. crp politics
pros: Decent, interesting, cutting edge tech

cons: i really cannot think of any

cons: Actual company's restructuring and poor professional growth in Mexico.
pros: Great place to work and work benefits.

cons: The traffic outside intel in bangalore takes almost 30mins to clear up at any given time.
advice: none
pros: Flexible timings to work. Very good work atmosphere to work.

cons: Not much increment budget, lack of market adjustment and managers with wrong attitudes

pros: Offers one of the best benefits out there!

cons: I don't see any cons here

cons: No Cons at all.. Just pros

pros: Personal development, Work/Life balance, Good management

cons: Very complicated performance review process
pros: The company has a very good compensation package and work-life-balance.

cons: Like in all corporate, you need to be very careful not to get stuck in a position that is very specific to the company and can not truly contribute to your skills set.
advice: Keep moving and revive "only the paranoids survive" mindset cause Intel is truly in one of its most critical phases.
pros: It is a huge corporate America company that accepts the fact the times are changing !. Sometimes there is no other choice but to let the "old" people go and hire new college graduates that were born into the new technologies. Innovation is encouraged by management.
summary: Management understand it is time for a change !

cons: none at the time. It was great
pros: Great products team and management

cons: Too focus on engineering and something away from end customer needs
advice: Communicate better and simpler
pros: It´s a company that revolutions technology

cons: growth in SW path is not as it is for HW. When profile is more SW related, eventually you will have to migrate to a different place.
pros: Great place to work, Amazing perks. Enjoy everyday and met the best people to work with

cons: i did not feel any bed think.
pros: You will get Intel tag.nice stipend.chances for permanent

cons: Can't find any, it is a really good place to work.
pros: Great company, good terms, goot atmosphere.

cons: Management makes it slower in aggressive market and Intel is losing its competitive edge so work here has become sluggish and boring. But it you are planning for a retirement then you are at right place😉.
advice: Old style and too much adamant for their view point. And no feedback from employees.
pros: I have worked in Intel for 6 years now and I can recommend this. Intel has all possible values an employee can imagine.
summary: This is one of the best places to work.

cons: good benefit good salary good management
advice: good management good employer good enviroment
pros: no problem to work in this company

cons: -The job scope is too narrow.-Turnover rate is very high in some groups.
advice: Retain your people.
pros: -Challenging technical works-Good work life balance-Great culture-Friendly environment

cons: projects taking very long time due to thorough validation process.
advice: keep up with the good work!
pros: Very professional team, very interesting projects./

cons: Strong culture, some adapt, some don´tLots of ambiguity & uncertainty during company reestructuringSometimes slow to make decisions, highly matrixed environment
pros: Very competitive compensation & benefits packageWork life balanceFriendly, smart peopleLeading edge companyLots of opportunity to grow & move around

cons: 1. Job is volatile2. Food is expensive in Cafe3. Lack of transparency in Appraisal process
advice: 1. Employee job should be secured2. Sufficient professional training should be provided ( Online/Classrooms)3. Cafe Rates should be controlled
pros: 1. Offers a good salary for RCG2. Good work life Balance3. Good sports activities4. Best Technical stuffs to work on5. Good Transport facility6. Stocks7. Good Health insurance policy8. Good Medical benifits

cons: Sehr forderndes und konkurrenzbetontes Umfeld, in dem Überstunden verlangt werden. Das Leistungsbewertungssystem ist brutal und kann zu Spannungen unter den Mitarbeitern führen. Aufstiegschancen vom mittleren Management nach oben sind beschränkt. Keine übermäßig freundliche oder persönliche Atmosphäre. Die physische Umgebung ist extrem kalt…grau Wände, graue Teppiche, graue Arbeitsnischen.
advice: Etwas weniger Arroganz und viel mehr Kundenorientierung sind nötig.
pros: In guten Zeiten bieten sich unzählige Möglichkeiten, alle paar Jahre neue Positionen einzunehmen. Die Möglichkeit, von zu Hause aus zu arbeiten und Gleitzeit werden in vielen Stellen und Gruppen unterstützt. Kluge und talentierte Kollegen. Interessante Jobmöglichkeiten und ergebnisorientiert.
summary: Großes Unternehmen mit exzellenten Produkten, das versucht relevant zu bleiben statt zum Massenprodukt zu werden

cons: you are never alone....think your best
pros: good job and wish you all the best

cons: Ich erinnere mich so weit an nichts...
pros: Flexible Arbeitszeiten... nette Bezahlung!

cons: Afhankelijk van je groep kun je ieder jaar een nieuwe manager krijgen. Er zijn redelijk grote reorganisaties en doorslaan van de balans iedere paar jaar. Huur huur huur, stop stop stop. Houden van telefonische vergaderingen. Je kunt er de hele dag mee bezig zijn. Als je dat niet wilt, vraag dan met wie je gaat werken. IT is zeer zeer geïsoleerd.
pros: Ziet er goed uit op een CV. Een hoop mogelijkheden (als je bereid bent naar de juiste plaats te verhuizen). Loon en compensatie is eerlijk op de lange termijn. Veel slimme mensen.

cons: Zusatzleistungen & Vergütung können besser sein.
advice: Gleich NULL
pros: Flexibel und guter Ausgleich von Arbeit und Privatleben

cons: Difficult to think of anything negative, sometimes I experienced delays and bad coordination during projects in dispersed teams, but this was to be expected and everything worked well in the end.
advice: Keep up the good work! Events, regular updates and internal communications are important and have very positive influence on engagement and general job satisfaction.
pros: Friendly casual athmosphere, great possibilities for training, wonderful helping colleagues, many opportunities for socializing at lunch time and events, appreciation for good work, social responsibility, volunteer work to give back to the community.

cons: Hohes Tempo und viel Zeitdruck - Stressresistenz und gute Resilienz zwingend erforderlich
advice: Langfristige Resourcenplanung wäre förderlich
pros: Internationales Unternehmen, Diversity wird hier in allen Aspekten gelebt, tolle Manager Kultur, viele Möglichkeiten für Menschen die gern gefordert werden und sich weiter entwickeln möchten.

cons: Es un trabajo demandante y las personas suelen estar estresadas. A veces es difícil lidiar con la burocracia.
pros: Tiene muy buen ambiente de trabajo y prestaciones. Hay muchas oportunidades para aprender. Para ser un internship pagan bien en comparación con otras empresas.
